overview: IT'S REAL shows the planning and producing that goes into a 3D performance. It also shows the backstage and post-show full story.The first star of cine live is Whee-sung. He always tried to show perfection on stage, but 9 years after his debut, he shows every aspect of his life. It shows every part of his life, including meetings with his staff, rehearsals, life at home, life as a lyricist, and his normal life with normal friends. It reveals the life of the that he has never showed anyone.
title: Live in 3D WHEESUNG : It's Real
